title: Ngubani umhlobo wethu?

title: UBONDA NODEVI
description: Ingaba ngenene kunyanzelekile ukuba abahlobo benene bangafani? UDevi noBonda ngabahlobo benene, kodwa uDevi yintwazana encinane, eli lixa uBonda ekwazi nokuphakamisa iibhokisi ezinzima, uyakwazi nokolula iingalo nemilenze yakhe, akukho nanye into akhe ayilibale xa eyixelelwe, uyakwazi ukumcima uphinde umvule. Unakho ukuqikelela ukuba ngenene ngenene uyintoni uBonda lo?
chapters: [{"image":{"id":94},"sortOrder":0,"id":73,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"\"Kwakhona! Bagcwalisele kwakhona Bonda! Ndifuna ukubakhiqa phantsi ngenye indlela!","sortOrder":0,"id":108},{"originalText":"Ngaphandle nje kokulibazisa ixesha, nangaphandle nje kokuhleka uBonda ubeka ntimfa ingxowa enyhukunyhuku phezu kwentloko yomnye ityeli lesihlanu. Isixwexwe sekhalibhodi sibekwe ngobunono ngendlela eyaziwa nguBonda kuphela ukuba yenziwa njani na.","sortOrder":1,"id":109}]},{"image":{"id":95},"sortOrder":1,"id":74,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Ndivungamisa injini yam ebaleka ngesantya esiphezulu kakhulu \u2013 vru-u-u-um, VR-U-U-UM \u2013 ndidubule, kweli ityeli ndivele kwicala elilungileyo. BHU-U-M! Ndigilise senditshwed\u2019 okwemveku njengoko isakhiwo ebesime ecaleni kwam sigqabhuka kube bubutyobo ecaleni kwam.","sortOrder":0,"id":110},{"originalText":"UBonda uyahleka, urheme uman\u2019 eqhwab\u2019 izandla, utsho ngengxolo endikruqulayo nabekhe wayenza xa bendiqala ukwenza le nto.","sortOrder":1,"id":111},{"originalText":"Bhota Bonda. Oyena mhlobo wenene nonyanisekileyo nakubani na obenokuhlobana naye. Ngakumbi inkwenkwana eneshumi leminyaka ehleli kwisitulo esinevili esiqhutywayo (wheel-chair).","sortOrder":2,"id":112}]},{"image":{"id":96},"sortOrder":2,"id":75,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bhota. NdinguDevi kwaye ndizelwe ngonyaka ka-2085 AD.","sortOrder":0,"id":113},{"originalText":"Utat\u2019 omkhulu wam usoloko ethetha ngendlela elitshintshe ngayo ihlabathi ukususela esentanga-nye nam ngo-2016. Kuxinene kakhulu ngoku kodwa umoya, siyabulela kuba ungcoliseke kancinci kunakuqala, kuba iinqwelo ezininzi ezikumgangatho ophakamileyo ngoku zisebenzisa umbane namandla aphehliweyo asuka kwisola. Zimbalwa kakhulu iingxaki eziba khona, kuba iinqwelo ziyaziqhuba ngokwazo ngobunono. Ambalwa kakhulu namahlathi nemithi njengoko yayikade imininzi kwimihla yangaphambili, kodwa ke emininzi isatyalwa nto leyo intle kakhulu.","sortOrder":1,"id":114},{"originalText":"Kodwa yintoni ngenene etshintshileyo? Uthi utat\u2019 omkhulu bubuchwepheshe bale mihla yokhanyo. Ibikhona le mpucuko yetekhnoloji nangomnyaka ka-2016, kodwa hayi ngendlela eyiyo kulo unyaka. Ibenze ubomi bayinto entle kakhulu.","sortOrder":2,"id":115},{"originalText":"Oh! Kanene nants\u2019 eny\u2019 into, ubomi bam. Yitekhnoloji endiphe umhlobo wam wenene.","sortOrder":3,"id":116}]},{"image":{"id":97},"sortOrder":3,"id":76,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"image":{"id":98},"sortOrder":4,"id":77,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Hlangana noBonda. Oyena mhlobo wenene nanini na, umfo olichule lokwenza isakhiwo ngamakhalibhodi, umfo oyinkcani ekwenzeni iRobhothi.","sortOrder":0,"id":117},{"originalText":"Ndiyawabona la mehlo akho agungquzayo. Ha-a! Akunakho ukuqikelela loo nto, unakho? Kodwa cinga ngayo. Ngowuphi omnye umhlobo ongakwakhela ngodlamko isakhiwo izihlandlo ezingaphezulu kwamashumi amahlanu engakhalazi nokukhalaza? Ngowuphi khona omnye umhlobo ongasakha esi sakhiwo ngobuchule rhoqo esenza?","sortOrder":1,"id":118},{"originalText":"Bonda: Ndiyavuma! Abantu abanabuchule bugqibeleleyo kanje ngathi. Kwaye basoloko bekhalazela ukuba ukwenza into enye rhoqo \u201ckuyadika\u201d. (Andazi ke mna ukuba elo gama lithetha ukuthini, ngoko ke ungabuzi kum ndedwa!) Kwaye baye bagule, kufuneke baquqe ngasese rhoqo. Kazi ukuba bayenze njani yonke into ngaphambi kokuba sifike apha!","sortOrder":2,"id":119}]},{"image":{"id":99},"sortOrder":5,"id":78,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Ukwakha izakhiwo akuphela kwento ayenzayo uBonda. Ndingamqeqesha enze nezinye izinto ezininzi \u2013 andiphosele iibhola ezimbini ezibaleka ngesantya esiphezulu nditsho ndilolonge indlela endibetha ngayo iphini leqakamba, ndithobe ibhokisi yam yeemfihlo kwelona tshelufa liphezulu, tshelufa elo ekungekhe kufikelele nabani na kulo ngaphandle kokusebenzisa ileli, ndiphakamise idesika kaTata enzima ngeyona ndlela, ukwenzela ndiwabone amacicana am egolide (Umama andikhwazele ke ehoboloza iiyure ngeeyure xa ndiwalahlile). Izinto ezinjalo wethu.","sortOrder":0,"id":120}]},{"image":{"id":100},"sortOrder":6,"id":79,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bonda: Njengoko benditshilo, awukho umsebenzi wabantu xa sibathelekisa nathi zirobhothsi. Izi-aram zabantu zibambeke kwiinkontyo zeelifti zazo, eli lixa thina sikhula sibe bade okanye sibe bafutshane nanini na sithanda, ngokolula okanye ukugoba iingalo nemilenze yethu. Amehlo ethu ziikhamera, oomabonakude neebhanya-bhanya (telescopes neemicroscopes) okanye zonke ezi zinto zidityaniswe ndaweni inye!","sortOrder":0,"id":121}]},{"image":{"id":101},"sortOrder":7,"id":80,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Ndimqeqesha njani uBonda? \u201cNgokumpheka avuthwe dubhu.\u201d Ukupheka umntu kuthetha ukumbonisa kanye ukuba into ethile yenziwa njani na. Umzekelo, ngomnye umhla, bendifuna andiphathele laa bhokisi yam yeemfihlo, le bendikuxelela ngayo ngaphambili. Nantsi into endiyenze ngayo:","sortOrder":0,"id":122},{"originalText":"Okokuqala, ndiye ndabonisa uBonda ishelufa ebihleli kulo, ndimzobele indlela eya kulo endlwini yam, nethi ayivelise efowunini yakhe ephucukileyo.","sortOrder":1,"id":123},{"originalText":"\u201cUngakwazi ukolula umnwe wakho ucofe le ndawo iveze ishelufa elingentla endlwini yam B?\u201d Ndiye ndamyalela loo nto xa efika endlwini yam. Ingalo yakhe ibilenga-lenga isehla isenyuka. Njengoko ebephithizela efuna-funa endlwini uye wayifumana ikhamera yam encinane iqhobosheke emnweni wakhe, nantso imana ithatha imifanekiso yento yonke esendlwini.","sortOrder":2,"id":124}]},{"image":{"id":102},"sortOrder":8,"id":81,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Xa endibonisa ezo foto, ndiye ndolatha ngokulula nje umfanekiso wale bhokisi bendiyifuna. \u201cLeyo ke Bonda yibhokisi yam yeemfihlo,\u201d Nditshilo ndisolatha. \u201cUngakwazi na ukuyizisa apha ezantsi kum?\u201d","sortOrder":0,"id":125},{"originalText":"Ngoku ke, nanini na ndifuna ibhokisi, ndiye ndithi, \u201cIbhokisi eneemfihlelo zam apha!\u201d nanko ke umf\u2019 omkhulu esiya ngqo kwishelufa ehleli kuyo. Xa \u201cefunde\u201d nto ithile, uBonda akasoze alibale. Ingqondo yakhe ingummangaliso!","sortOrder":1,"id":126},{"originalText":"Bonda: Engummangaliso? Oko kwenzeka kubantu abangagqibelelanga, abangekhe balibale ukuba bazibeke phi na izitshixo zabo, iindondo zabo zamehlo, noonomyayi babo\u2026","sortOrder":2,"id":127}]},{"image":{"id":103},"sortOrder":9,"id":82,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Ewe unjalo kanye ugxa wam. Ndiyintombazana enentlahla ngenene. Oh! Ungandivi kakubi \u2013 Andingomntu ongaqhelekanga. Ndinabo abahlobo endidlala nendihamba nabo xa ndisiya esikolweni. Kodwa ndiyamthanda uBonda ngaphezu kwabo bonke, kuba akakruquki xa ndisonwaba nomnye umntu okanye abe nomona xa ndimodlule kwizibalo, okanye aqumbe xa ndilibele ukumnqwenelela usuku lwakhe oluhle lokuzalwa\u2026","sortOrder":0,"id":128},{"originalText":"Psst! Le nto yenziwa kukuba uBonda engenamizwa! Kodwa ungayikhwazi loo nto \u2013 ingamenza angazivi kamnandi.","sortOrder":1,"id":129}]},{"image":{"id":104},"sortOrder":10,"id":83,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bonda: Tsk, tsk, Devi, uphi umqondo wakho ntombazana? Uthi andinamizwa, emva koko unexhala lokuba \u201cndiza kuziva kakubi\u201d. Abantu banakho ukuqiqa, kodwa xa bephethwe \u201cyimizwa\u201d engemnandanga okanye benemisindo okanye besoyika, lowo mqondo uyanyamalala! Ha-suka! Tshi-i! Ngubani odinga imizwa?","sortOrder":0,"id":130},{"originalText":"Yima! Ingaba loo nto \u201cibiyimizwa\u201d le ndigqiba kuyiva ngoku? Umqondo wam undixelela loo nto. Undixelela ukuba ndiva into ebizwa \u201cukonyanya\u201d\u2026 Hmm... Andazi ukuba ndizive njani ngaloo nto.","sortOrder":1,"id":131}]},{"image":{"id":105},"sortOrder":11,"id":84,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Ooh, nantsi indawo enomdla \u2013 andizange ndikhe ndizive kakubi xa ezonwabisa nomnye umhlobo wakhe endaweni yam, kuba\u2026 akanawumbi umhlobo!","sortOrder":0,"id":132},{"originalText":"Bonda: Hey, hey, asiyonyani leyo \u2013 ndinazo ezinye iitshomi! La robhothi iyiweyitara evenkileni nesoloko isithi, \u201cBhota\u201d ivathe uncumo, njengoko nalaa robhothi incedisa ekuthutheni impahla evenkileni idla ngokutsho\u2026","sortOrder":1,"id":133},{"originalText":"Yima kancinci\u2026 Ndigqiba kuphicotha oku bekuthethwa nguDevi\u2026 undithanda kuba ndingenazo ezinye iitshomi \u2013 Kwaye ungandivi kakubi! Hayi kuba ndindim! Oh kanene ndiva imizwa egxalatheleneyo \u2013 ndiziva ndinomsindo, ndikhathazekile ndi\u2026","sortOrder":2,"id":134}]},{"image":{"id":106},"sortOrder":12,"id":85,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"\"Bonda! Ingaba uziva kamnandi? Unokubila okungaphayaa, Bonda \u2013 unomkhuhlane! Kwaye iqhosha elikucimayo alisebenzi!","sortOrder":0,"id":135},{"originalText":"\"Kodwa musa ukukhathazeka, mhlobo wam, ndiza kukukhathalela njengokuba udla ngokwenza nawe kum. Mamela kakuhle ke ngoku, Bonda \u2013 ndiza kukuvala ngoku ukwenzela umzimba wakho uchache, kulungile neh? Musa ukoyika \u2013 iza kufana nokulala nje, kuphelele ke apho. Xa ndikuvusa kwakhona, uza kubuyela esimeni sakho, umtsha ungumrhacaca, kwaye siza kuba ngabahlobo benene kwakhona. Uyandiva nje phofu?\u201d","sortOrder":1,"id":136},{"originalText":"Bonda: Amehlo kaDevi amanzi onke, afana naxa ekhathazekile okanye esoyika. Loo nto indenza ndibe nemizwa yokungonwabi. Kodwa umqondo wam undixelela ukuba obu bumanzi bamehlo akhe kwenziwa kukuba endikhathalele ngenene. Ngoku ndiva imizwa yokonwaba\u2026 Ndibhidekile kakhulu\u2026 ndonwabile kwaye ndikhathazekile ngaxesha-nye\u2026 ndiyazivala ngoku\u2026","sortOrder":2,"id":137}]},{"image":{"id":107},"sortOrder":13,"id":86,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Umoya uthi fu-u-u-u! Kwaye uthi hu-u-u-u! Njengokuba evuka kwakhona uBonda. Ndilwa neenyembezi zam.","sortOrder":0,"id":138},{"originalText":"\"Bonda?\" Ndithi, \"Bonda, uyandiva na? Uyandazi ukuba ndingubani? Ndicela undixelele ukuba umqondo weenkumbulo zakho awuvalekanga kwathi cwaka! Ndifuna ukhumbule zonke izinto ezimnandi nezonwabisayo esibe nazo kunyaka odlulileyo, lonke uthando...\"","sortOrder":1,"id":139}]},{"image":{"id":108},"sortOrder":14,"id":87,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bonda: A-ha! Uthando. Ingaba loo nto ibingumzwa endiziva ngawo, laa mizwa yokonwaba nokukhathazek","sortOrder":0,"id":140}]},{"image":{"id":109},"sortOrder":15,"id":88,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bonda ndijonge.","sortOrder":0,"id":141},{"originalText":"\"Bhota Devi! Ungathanda ndikwenzele ntoni namhlanje? Singamdlala umasicashelane? Ndingakuphathela ibhokisi yakho yeemfihlo? Uyafuna phofu\u2026\"","sortOrder":1,"id":142},{"originalText":"\"Bonda! Uphile sakaa! Oh, ndiyavuya, vuyi vuyi vuyiyani!\"","sortOrder":2,"id":143},{"originalText":"Ndilahlela iingalo zam kuBonda ndimmbambazele ndimthe nkqi!","sortOrder":3,"id":144}]},{"image":{"id":110},"sortOrder":16,"id":89,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bonda: Ndenza into engaqhelekanga ubona nje, indlela endingazange ndayiboniswa mntu ukuba ndiyenze. Ndijikelisa iingalo zam kumhlobo wam uDevi, isizathu saloo nto andisazi tu tu tu.","sortOrder":0,"id":145}]},{"sortOrder":17,"id":90,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"IIROBHOTHSI: ZAYIZOLO, ZANAMHLANJE NEZANGOMSO","sortOrder":0,"id":146},{"originalText":"Ingaba uza kuba khona uBonda ukunceda uDevi de kube ngumnyaka ka2085? Kuza kufuneka silinde sibukele, kodwa akukho kuphika ukuba iirobhothsi ziza kuba qelele ngolwazi nkqu kwiminyaka engamashumi amabini anesihlanu ezayo ukususela ngoku, ukuya kunyaka ka-2040.","sortOrder":1,"id":147},{"originalText":"Ngubani? Iyintoni irobhothi?","sortOrder":2,"id":148},{"originalText":"Ukuba uthe irobhothi ngumatshini okhangeleka nowenza izinto njengabantu, gqwidi nje ukukekela oku xa ihamba, ukungabi namfaneleko kwelizwi layo, amehlo abhanya-bhanya nathi qhwanya xa ivuliwe irobhothi, ubonakala ubukela iifilimu neenkqubo zikamabona-kude ezininzi. Kuba, kahle kahle, irobhothi le \u201cyiyo nayiphi na imatshini yombane elawulwa yikhompyutha okanye imicwana yeentambo esebenza ngombane.\u201d Kakuhle ncam, ayifanelanga kukhangeleka njengomntu gqibi. Yiyo loo nto ubungenakho ukuyiqaphela into yokuba sihlala singqongwe ziirobhothsi!","sortOrder":3,"id":149},{"originalText":"Nyhani? Phi?","sortOrder":4,"id":150},{"originalText":"Mamela ke, zikho kwimizi-mveliso, kwimizi-ntengiso, ezifama, ezibhedlele, nkqu nasemakhaya. Zinakho ukukhangeleka njengemitshini eneengalo ezinkulu, njengeziyaa zikwimivi-mveliso yeemoto, ezobuchweli, ukuncamathisela iglue nokupeyinta amalungu eemoto. Okanye zisenokubonakala njengeekhamera, njengeziyaa zifumaneka ezibhedlele, nezithiwe ncaa eludongeni ngeentanjana ezibhityileyo, nezinokusetyenziswa ukuxilonga iingxaki zamathumbu ethu. Ezinye iirobhothsi zikhangeleka njengamacwecwana azizicaba asisazinge, nasebenza emakhayeni ethu naseziofisini, naziyaa ezinye zivuvuza zifunxa uthuli zicoca iimethi zezindlu zethu xa wonke ubani ngokuhlwa elele. Ezinye zikhangeleka njengeenqwelwana ezincinci nezisetyenziswa empini okanye kwiindawo ezinobungozi njengemigodi, okanye zindande phezu komhlaba, enyangeni, kwiMars, zithatha imifanekiso zikwaqokelela neesampuli ezizithumela kubacwaningi (scientists) ezantsi emhlabeni.","sortOrder":5,"id":151}]},{"image":{"id":111},"sortOrder":18,"id":91,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"sortOrder":19,"id":92,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Ndinqwenela buqu ukuba ndikhe ndibone irobhothi!","sortOrder":0,"id":152},{"originalText":"Ukuba wawukhe wayisebenzisa, okanye wayibona ikhompyutha neeselula ezikumgangatho ophezulu zale mihla, uyibonile irobhothi. Ewe, ziyafumaneka kwezo ndawo zinjalo. Ezinye zazo zide zibe nawo namagama, njengooSiri nooCortana (wawukhe weva ngabo?) Ziyasinceda ukufumana ulwazi olubalulekileyo \u2013 izinto ezinceda iiprojekthi zesikolo, iingxelo zamagosa-ezendlela (zeziphi iindlela ezinoxinano lweemoto namhlanje? Yeyiphi indlela eyenye esingayisebenzisa ukuphungula olu xinano?), ezolonwabo (iqhubeka phi imuvi entsha kaDeepika Padukone? Kwaye umboniso wayo olandelayo?), nezinye nezinye ke. Zisenokusibhalisela amatikiti ebhasi nawetreyini, zisithengele ukutya, zisixelele ukuba zingaphi na iikhalorizi (calories) zokutya emizimbeni yethu nesiziphunguleyo emva komdlalo webhola.","sortOrder":1,"id":153},{"originalText":"Likhangeleka njani ikamva leerobhothsi? Liza kuba njani ilizwe ngeminyaka yoo-2040, xa sijonge imisebenzi yeerobhothsi?","sortOrder":2,"id":154},{"originalText":"Sisenokungabi nazo iirobhothsi ezihamba ezitalatweni zethu zase-India ngo-2040, kodwa ngokuqinisekileyo siza kube singqongwe ziirobhothsi zale intlobo okanye enye sibe singayazi thina loo nto. Kusenokwenzeka ukuba zakube zikhona \u201ciirobhothsi\u201d zeemoto eziziqhubayo ezitalatweni zethu. Sisenokuba nazo neerobhothi ezincinane kakhulu kwiikhamera zethu ezixokomezelelwayo (contact lenses) ezisinceda ukuthwebula izithombe \u2013 akuzudingeka nokuba sizibambe iiselula zethu neekhamera ukuthatha izithombe (kodwa siza kuzithatha njani iiselfi?) Neerobhothsi ezincinane ezibizwa iidrones ziza kube zindandela phezulu ziqukeza apha naphaya \u2013 zihambisa iileta, imithwalo iikababs, ziphumze abafana abangoomalayisha-mithwalo, nangethemba lokuba zakunciphisa nolu xinano lweemoto lungaka ezindleleni! Ngomnya ka-2085, kwiminyaka engama-45 emva koko, Ngubani owaziyo ukuba zakube ziphezu kwantoni iirobhothsi?","sortOrder":3,"id":155}]}]

title: ULara, ubhantom otyheli
description: Ubhantom otyheli kwihlabathi elibomvu. ULara, ubhantom otyheli  ufuna nje ufana nabanye.
chapters: [{"image":{"id":77},"sortOrder":0,"id":68,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"image":{"id":79},"sortOrder":1,"id":70,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"ULara, ongubhantom, wayeyirhorho ekhethekileyo. Wayengafani tu nabahlobo bakhe, kuba yena wayenamaphiko akhazimlayo natyheli.","sortOrder":0,"id":105}]},{"image":{"id":80},"sortOrder":2,"id":71,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Wonke umntu wayewathanda amaphiko akhe atyheli.","sortOrder":0,"id":106},{"originalText":"Rhoqo kusasa, uBhibhi Bhabhathane wayebulisa uLara, kanti noManto Mntanezulu wayethanda ukumbulisa, ngokumwangawangisela.","sortOrder":1,"id":107}]}]

title: Umngani wam osenyongweni
description: Ibali lotshomi ababethandana kakhulu kodwa bengabonani.
chapters: [{"image":{"id":33},"sortOrder":0,"id":29,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"image":{"id":34},"sortOrder":1,"id":30,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Ndinetshomi. Ihlala nam ekhaya.","sortOrder":0,"id":37}]},{"image":{"id":35},"sortOrder":2,"id":31,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Xa ndonwabile, nayo iyonwaba.","sortOrder":0,"id":38}]},{"image":{"id":36},"sortOrder":3,"id":32,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Xa ndikhala, nayo iyakhala.","sortOrder":0,"id":39}]},{"image":{"id":37},"sortOrder":4,"id":33,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Kodwa andiliva ilizwi layo. Itshomi yam iphila ngaphakathi esipilini.","sortOrder":0,"id":40}]},{"image":{"id":38},"sortOrder":5,"id":34,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Phuma apho, ndiye ndimxelele, kwenzele sisozadlala. Akafuni ukuphuma esipilini.","sortOrder":0,"id":41}]},{"image":{"id":39},"sortOrder":6,"id":35,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Ndiye ndikhathazeke. Ndihambe ndiyokulala.","sortOrder":0,"id":42}]},{"image":{"id":40},"sortOrder":7,"id":36,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Xa ndilele uyafika emaphupheni azokudlala nam, siye sonwabe kakhulu.","sortOrder":0,"id":43}]},{"image":{"id":41},"sortOrder":8,"id":37,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Siyadlala, siyabaleka, siyakhwaza simemeza sobabini.","sortOrder":0,"id":44}]},{"image":{"id":42},"sortOrder":9,"id":38,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Xa ndithetha naye, uye andiphendule.","sortOrder":0,"id":45}]},{"image":{"id":43},"sortOrder":10,"id":39,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Xa ndivuka ekuseni, ndivuka engekho ebuyele esipilini.","sortOrder":0,"id":46}]},{"image":{"id":44},"sortOrder":11,"id":40,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Ndiye ndingakhathazeki nakancinci. Ndiye ndazi ukuba sizodlala kwakhona xa ndilele ebusuku!","sortOrder":0,"id":47}]}]

title: Uncumo lwebhabhathane
description: Intsapho kaKavya isandula ukufudukela kwilali yakhe yaya eBangaluru kwaye yeyona ntombazana intsha kwiklasi yakhe. Yiya kunye noKavya njengoko etyelele ipaki yamabhabhathane apho afumana khona unxibelelwano olukhethekileyo namabhabhathane kwaye wenza nomhlobo omtsha.
chapters: [{"image":{"id":57},"sortOrder":0,"id":50,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"image":{"id":58},"sortOrder":1,"id":51,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"\"Emgceni bafundi! Masiyeni epakini,\" utshilo Miss Leyila.Bonke abafundi babambe izandla, bencokola bemka. UKavya umi yedwa.Njengokuba beqala ukuhamba, uMiss uyabuza, \"Ngaba ukhona umntu owaziyo ukuba umbungu uba yintoni xa ukhula?\"Isisu sikaKavya siyabhabha. Uyayazi impendulo! Ngaba kufuneka athethe into?","sortOrder":0,"id":77}]},{"image":{"id":59},"sortOrder":2,"id":52,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"UKavya kunye nosapho lwakhe basandula ukufudukela eBangaluru besuka kwilali yakhe.Bahlala kwindawo yokwakha apho basebenza khona abazali bakhe. Kunzima ukuhlala kwindlu engagqityiwayo. Umoya unuka umsi, kwaye ukuphith8izela kweendlela kwenza kube nzima ukulala. Izakhiwo ezinde, kuphithizela iimoto, kunye nabantu abaxakekileyo bamenza azive emncinci kakhulu.","sortOrder":0,"id":78}]},{"image":{"id":60},"sortOrder":3,"id":53,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"UKavya ebesesikolweni iveki yonke. Akakhange athethe namntu.Ungathini xa behlekisa ngegama lakhe? Okanye umgezela ngenxa yokuba engazange aye UKavya uthatha umoya kwaye uphakamisa isandla. Kwidolophu enengxolo efana neBangaluru, akanakuthula ngonaphakade. ngaphambili?","sortOrder":0,"id":79}]},{"image":{"id":61},"sortOrder":4,"id":54,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"\"Xa imibungu ikhula, iba ngamabhabhathane,\" utshilo uKavya. \"Kuko oko!\" U- tshilo uMiss. uMiss uthi. \"Imibungu yimibungu kuphela kwiiveki ezimbalwa,\" utshilo uKavya. \"Bachitha lonke elo xesha besitya amagqabi.\"\"Bamele babe bakhulu kakhulu,\" utsho uMary, ofunda naye. \"Ewe baba bakhulu!\"\"Emva kokuba betyile batya batya, imibungu yaluka i khukhuni emacaleni ezityalo. Ziyangena ngaphakathi, apho zikhula kwaye zitshintshe,\" utshilo uKavya.","sortOrder":0,"id":80}]},{"image":{"id":62},"sortOrder":5,"id":55,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Kulungile, utshilo uMiss. \"Bahlala kwimigqomo kangangeeveki ezimbini. Xa bephuma, ngamabhabhathane.\"\"Jonga, sisepakini!\" Utshilo uMary.UKavya uyothuka. Ipaki igqunywe ngamabhabhathane!","sortOrder":0,"id":81}]},{"image":{"id":63},"sortOrder":6,"id":56,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Amabhabhathane aluhlaza Amabhabhathane amthubi umbala wokukhanya kwelanga. wemilambo. Amabhabhathane eorenji umbala weechikoos ezivuthiweyo.","sortOrder":0,"id":82},{"originalText":"Amabhabhathane amnyama nomhlophe imibala yesibhakabhaka esineenkwenkwezi.","sortOrder":1,"id":83},{"originalText":"Yonke le mibala ayikhumbulayo uKavya kwilali yakhe.Uva intliziyo yakhe iduduzela.","sortOrder":2,"id":84}]},{"image":{"id":64},"sortOrder":7,"id":57,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"\"Qho ngonyaka, amabhabhathane ahamba amawaka eekhilomitha ukuza kule paki. Alapha ukufumana ukutya okuninzi, imozulu engcono, kunye nendawo ekhuselekileyo yokubeka amaqanda,\" utshilo u Miss. \"Olu hambo lubizwa ngokuba yimfuduko.\"","sortOrder":0,"id":85}]},{"image":{"id":65},"sortOrder":8,"id":58,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"\"Abadinwa, ukubetha amaphiko ixesha elide?\" Umntu ofunda naye uyabuza.\"Ukuba kukho umoya onamandla, akufuneki babethe amaphiko,\" utshilo uKavya. \"Bawaneka amaphiko abo kunye nokutyibilika.\"\"Oko kuya kuba nzima,\" uMary uhlebela uKavya.","sortOrder":0,"id":86}]},{"image":{"id":66},"sortOrder":9,"id":59,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"U-Kavya ucinga ngokukhwela ibhasi eya e-Bengaluru-efakwe phakathi kwayo yonke imithwalo. Ukuqhuma kunye nokuwa kweeyure kunye neeyure","sortOrder":0,"id":87},{"originalText":"Ngaba leyo yindlela ibhabhathane elivakalelwa ngayo emoyeni?","sortOrder":1,"id":88}]},{"image":{"id":67},"sortOrder":10,"id":60,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"\"Xa amabhabhathane efuduka, alandela imilambo. Ukuhlala usempilweni, ayamisa ecaleni konxweme lomlambo ukuze anyibilikise iiminerali ngeenyawo zawo. Kubizwa ngokuba kukuntywila ngodaka,\" utshilo uMiss.\"Ukuntywila ngodaka?\" Utshilo uMary. \"Oko kuvakala ngathi kumnandi.\"UMary noKavya bayancuma.","sortOrder":0,"id":89},{"originalText":"\"Ngu,\" utshilo uKavya. \"Kodwa ngoku imilambo kunzima ukuyifumana.\"Kwilali yaseKavya, amadoda eelori athabatha isanti emlanjeni. Imozulu iya isiba shushu ngakumbi. Iyancipha imvula.","sortOrder":1,"id":90}]},{"image":{"id":68},"sortOrder":11,"id":61,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Kunyaka ophelileyo, umlambo womile.","sortOrder":0,"id":91},{"originalText":"Amabhabhathane ayengenawo amanzi aneleyo kwidaka lodaka.","sortOrder":1,"id":92},{"originalText":"Usapho lukakaKavya lwalungenawo amanzi aneleyo okulima.","sortOrder":2,"id":93},{"originalText":"Kungenxa yoko le nto bafudukela eBangaluru.","sortOrder":3,"id":94}]},{"image":{"id":69},"sortOrder":12,"id":62,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Uyazi kakhulu ngamabhabhathane, Kavya, utshilo uMiss\"Kungenxa yokuba zezona zinambuzane zam ndizithandayo,\" utshilo uKavya..\"Kutheni uthanda amabhabhathane kakhulu, Kavya?\" Kubuza uMary.UKavya angayikhetha njani into ibe nye?Uyayithanda indlela imizimba yabo ngamanye amaxesha ebonwa ngayo kwaye ngamanye amaxesha enemigca. Basela njani incindi ngeempumlo zabo ezinde. Basasaza njani umungu, nto leyo eyenza ukuba iintyatyambo ezininzi zikhule.","sortOrder":0,"id":95}]},{"image":{"id":70},"sortOrder":13,"id":63,"storyBookParagraphs":[]},{"image":{"id":71},"sortOrder":14,"id":64,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"\"Babhabhela kude, kodwa naphina apho bafika khona, bazenzela abahlobo abatsha,\" utshilo uKavya, ecofa isandla sikaMary. \"Bancinci kakhulu, kodwa banesibindi kakhulu.\"\"Kanye njengawe,\" utshilo uMiss.UKavya uyancuma luncumo olubanzi njengamaphiko ebhabhathane.","sortOrder":0,"id":96}]},{"image":{"id":72},"sortOrder":15,"id":65,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Yenza iSitishi sokuphumla seBhabhathane","sortOrder":0,"id":97},{"originalText":"Amabhabhathane aseIndiya afuduka kabini ngonyaka. Uhambo lwabo luya lusiba nzima ngokuba amahlathi nemilambo yethu iyanyamalala. Amabhabhathane akanayo indawo eyoneleyo yokuphumla. Uninzi luyadinwa apha endleleni.Enye indlela yokunceda amabhabhathane kukwenza iindawo ezikhuselekileyo zokuma kunye nokutya okumnandi.","sortOrder":1,"id":98}]},{"image":{"id":73},"sortOrder":16,"id":66,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Nantsi indlela yokwenza isikhululo sokuphumla sebhabhathane:","sortOrder":0,"id":99},{"originalText":"Fumana inqanawa ethe tyaba enemiphetho ephezulu, njengetali okanye ipleyiti.","sortOrder":1,"id":100},{"originalText":"Amabhabhathane ayayithanda imibala eqaqambileyo. Yenza ipeyinti inqanawa ibomvu, tyheli, okanye orenji.","sortOrder":2,"id":101},{"originalText":"Gcwalisa inqanawa ngokutya kwebhabhathane. Kulula ukwenza! Hlanganisa iikomityi ezine zamanzi kunye nekomityi enye yeswekile.","sortOrder":3,"id":102}]},{"image":{"id":74},"sortOrder":17,"id":67,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Yongeza iziqwenga zeziqhamo ezivuthiweyo. Amabhabhathane ayazithanda iibhanana, iigwava, iimango, iipapaya kunye neeorenji.","sortOrder":0,"id":103},{"originalText":"Gcina inqanawa ngaphandle kwiveranda yakho, efestileni, okanye naphina ngaphandle.Coca kwaye uzalise inqanawa rhoqo kwiintsuku ezimbini ukuya kwezintathu.Ukutsala amabhabhathane nangakumbi, tyala iintyatyambo ezithandwa ngamabhabhathane. Unokutyala i-verbena, i-geraniums, i-dahlias, okanye i-sunflowers. Awudingi ndawo ininzi - ungazityala ezimbizeni emhlabeni, okanye uzigcine kwiifestile.","sortOrder":1,"id":104}]}]

title: Xa ndikhula
description: Ndingu Papori ndiyakuba yinjineli xa ndimdala. Le ncwadi ingazo zonke izinto endiyakuzokha. igcwele amagama amakhulu, kodwa ikwazele zizigigaba. Yiza undijoyine

Siza kuqubha","sortOrder":2,"id":56},{"originalText":"ngeentlanzi, ukrebe neminenga.","sortOrder":3,"id":57},{"originalText":"UAnaideo uzakuthi, \u201cCothoza, Papori!\u201dKodwa ngasese, uya kuyithanda nayo.","sortOrder":4,"id":58},{"originalText":"Xa ndakha i-submarine yam,","sortOrder":5,"id":59},{"originalText":"Ndiza kuba yinjineli yaselwandle.","sortOrder":6,"id":60}]},{"image":{"id":50},"sortOrder":3,"id":45,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Andikagqibi!","sortOrder":0,"id":61},{"originalText":"Emva koko, ndiza kwakha irobhothi.","sortOrder":1,"id":62},{"originalText":"Igama lakhe nguGogo.","sortOrder":2,"id":63},{"originalText":"Mna noGogo siza kuba neziganeko ezininzi.","sortOrder":3,"id":64},{"originalText":"Siza peyinta iindonga kwaye sihlambe izitya.","sortOrder":4,"id":65},{"originalText":"Siza kubamba iAnaideo iintlanzi ezininzi, ezininzi!","sortOrder":5,"id":66},{"originalText":"Xa ndakha i-robot yam,","sortOrder":6,"id":67},{"originalText":"Ndiya kuba yinjineli yeerobhothi.","sortOrder":7,"id":68}]},{"image":{"id":51},"sortOrder":4,"id":46,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Mna noMakhulu ndiza kwakha udonga lomlilo.","sortOrder":0,"id":69},{"originalText":"Iya kugada iikhompyuter kunye ne-Intanethi","sortOrder":1,"id":70},{"originalText":"kubantu ababi abazama ukuba iimfihlo zabanye abantu.","sortOrder":2,"id":71},{"originalText":"Ndiya kuba njengegorha!","sortOrder":3,"id":72},{"originalText":"Xa ndikhusela i-Intanethi,","sortOrder":4,"id":73},{"originalText":"Ndiya kuba yinjineli yokhuseleko.","sortOrder":5,"id":74}]},{"image":{"id":52},"sortOrder":5,"id":47,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Iinjineli Zakha Ilizwe Lethu","sortOrder":0,"id":75},{"originalText":"Iinjineli zenza, zicwangcise kwaye ziyile umhlaba osingqongileyo.
